text: To resolve overheating issues: shut down the machine, inspect coolant filters, clean or replace filters, verify coolant flow, and restart the machine.
For vibration issues: stop operation, inspect bearings, replace worn components, recalibrate spindle, and perform test run.
If a sensor fault occurs: power down the machine, inspect sensor wiring, replace faulty sensors, and recalibrate.
To correct axis misalignment: loosen mounting bolts, realign axis using calibration tools, tighten bolts, and validate accuracy.
For power instability: inspect power supply, replace faulty units, verify grounding, and test voltage stability.
Lubrication maintenance procedure: check oil levels daily, refill as needed, inspect lines for blockage, and verify flow.
Tool change troubleshooting: remove debris from tool magazine, inspect actuators, lubricate moving parts, and test tool changes.
Heat exchanger cleaning procedure: isolate coolant system, flush exchanger, inspect for clogs, and restore coolant flow.
Controller recovery procedure: restore configuration from backup, verify firmware version, and perform system restart.
Mechanical noise inspection: stop machine, inspect belts and fasteners, adjust tension, and resume operation after validation.
